eu.amidst.core.datastream.filereaders

Interface DataFileReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<DataRow>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ARFFDataFolderReader, ARFFDataReader

    public interface DataFileReader
extends Iterable<DataRow>
    This interface defines a data file reader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void close()
      Closes this DataFileReader.
      boolean doesItReadThisFile(String fileName)
      Tests if this DataFileReader could read the given filename.
      Attributes getAttributes()
      Returns the set of Attributes in this DataFileReader.
      default Iterator<DataRow> iterator()
      Returns an Iterator over the stream of DataRow objects.
      void loadFromFile(String path)
      Loads this DataFileReader from a given file.
      default Stream<DataRow> parallelStream()
      Returns a Stream of DataRow objects to be processed in parallel.
      default Stream<DataRow> parallelStream(int batchSize)
      Returns a fixed batch Stream of DataRow objects to be processed in parallel.
      default void restart()
      Restarts this DataFileReader.
      Stream<DataRow> stream()
      Returns a Stream of DataRow objects to be processed sequentially.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • loadFromFile

        void loadFromFile(String path)
        Loads this DataFileReader from a given file.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file from which the DataFileReader will be loaded.

      • getAttributes

        Attributes getAttributes()
        Returns the set of Attributes in this DataFileReader.
        Returns:
        a valid Attributes object.

      • doesItReadThisFile

        boolean doesItReadThisFile(String fileName)
        Tests if this DataFileReader could read the given filename.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the filename.
        Returns:
        true if the filename could be read.

      • stream

        Stream<DataRow> stream()
        Returns a Stream of DataRow objects to be processed sequentially.
        Returns:
        a valid Java stream of DataRow objects.

      • restart

        default void restart()
        Restarts this DataFileReader. This method is only needed if the iterator is not based on streams.

      • close

        default void close()
        Closes this DataFileReader. This method is only needed if the iterator is not based on streams.

      • parallelStream

        default Stream<DataRow> parallelStream(int batchSize)
        Returns a fixed batch Stream of DataRow objects to be processed in parallel.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the batch size.
        Returns:
        a fixed batch stream to be processed in parallel.
        See Also:
        FixedBatchParallelSpliteratorWrapper

      • parallelStream

        default Stream<DataRow> parallelStream()
        Returns a Stream of DataRow objects to be processed in parallel.
        Returns:
        a stream to be processed in parallel.

      • iterator

        default Iterator<DataRow> iterator()
        Returns an Iterator over the stream of DataRow objects.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        an Iterator over the stream of DataRow objects.
